sword.name: Loyal Sword
sword.desc:
Increases offense and damage of the troop, Sagittarius(i) can learn Dispersion.
Dispersion: Enable to attack all enemy units at once but causing only 15% of the usual damage of the as when it's hitting just one particular unit.(Dispersion is only used against divisions if the damage to their HP is great than Sagittarii’ regular.)
sword.long_desc: A great sword, noble treasure from the Senate, its power will frighten the enemy.

helmet.name: خوذة الولاء
helmet.desc: معدات الولاء او الاخلاص كانت حجر الاساس عند القادة الرومان لانشاء الامبراطورية الخاصة بيهم
helmet.long_desc: بعد انهزام الملوك القياصرة فى المعارك المخاضة يتم الاعتماد على بشكل كبير عى المعدات لمضاعفة قوة الجيوش وبث روح الحماس فى قلوبهم وبداية لذالك كانت اهم المعدات هى معدات الولاء

shield.name: Loyal Armour
shield.desc: Increases defense and HP of the troop.
shield.long_desc: A great armour, noble treasure from the Senate, it can increase the protection.

armor.name: Loyal Shield
armor.desc: Increases defense and HP of the troop.
armor.long_desc: A great shield, noble treasure from the Senate, made of wood, fur and metal make it stronger.

boot.name: Loyal Shoes

boot.long_desc: Great shoes, noble treasure from the Senate, made of fur, good in offense and defence.

sword.name: Lion Sword
sword.desc: Slightly increases attack and damage of the troops led by hero.
sword.long_desc: Left by lion,a sword made of tusk can cut off any obstacles incomparably.

helmet.name: Lion Helmet
helmet.desc: Slightly increases attack,damage and life of the troops led by hero.
helmet.long_desc: A delicate helmet with lion head shape,is glistening in the sunshine.

shield.name: Lion Shield
shield.desc: Slightly increases life and defense of the troops led by hero.
shield.long_desc: A shield painted with lion, is full of courage from bravery, can easily defend heavy attacks.

armor.name: Lion Armor
armor.desc: Increases life and defense of the troops led by hero,arms Principes with the skill Testudo.
armor.long_desc: A piece of armor beset with fur, owns exceptional defense.

boot.name: Lion Boots
boot.desc: Slightly increases attack,defense and damage of the troops led by hero.
boot.long_desc: A pair of legendary boots is made of lion's fur posthumously.

sword.name: Dark Blade
sword.desc: Slightly increases damage and attack of the troops led by hero.
sword.long_desc: Legendary sword of Lord of Dead with diamonds.

helmet.name: Dark Helmet
helmet.desc: Slightly increases damage and attack of the troops led by hero
helmet.long_desc: An iron helmet bound with the hair from the Lord of Dead

shield.name: درع الظلام
shield.desc:
يزيد مستوى الدفاع للقوات التي يقودها
 البطل تدريجيا
shield.long_desc:
الدرع العظيم يزن 50 باوند مليء بالحقد والكرة
 من الجنود الموتى, يستطيع وبسهولة الحماية 
من الهجمات الثقيلة

armor.name: Dark Armor
armor.desc: Slightly increases defense of the troops led by hero, when the special effect Block Annihilation Sweep is triggered, can defend great strikes with the lowest cost.

boot.name: Dark Shoes
boot.desc: Slightly increases defense, damage and attack of the troops led by hero
boot.long_desc: Made of furs from evil dragon killed by Lord of Dead.

sword.name: Fearlessness Sword
sword.desc: Increases attack and damage of the troops led by hero.
sword.long_desc: A used sword belonging to Mars, once killed demon.

helmet.name: Fearlessness Helmet
helmet.desc: Increases life,attack and damage of the troops led by hero.
helmet.long_desc: A used helmet belonging to Mars with high solidity.

shield.name: Fearlessness Shield
shield.desc: Increases life and defense of the troops led by hero.
shield.long_desc: A shield forged by Vulcan,owns exceptional defense.

armor.name: Fearlessness Armor
armor.desc: Increases life and defense of the troops led by hero,arms Principes with the skill Testudo.
armor.long_desc: A piece of armor owns the thought of Mars.

boot.name: Fearlessness Boots
boot.desc: Increases attack,defense and damage of the troops led by hero.
boot.long_desc: A used boots belonging to Mars, can let the world tremble.

sword.name: Saturn Hoe
sword.desc: Increases life,attack and damage of the troops led by the hero
sword.long_desc: A gift from Saturn, which is sharp and heavy for Battle Hardened on farmland, having greater attack.

helmet.name: Saturn Rain Hat
helmet.desc: Increases life and attack of the troops led by the hero
helmet.long_desc: A gift from Saturn,which is versatile, excellent for both attacker and defender, can effectively raise Life.

shield.name: Saturn Fan
shield.desc: Increases life and damage of the troops led by the hero
shield.long_desc: A gift from Saturn, which is light and easy to use,  increasing life effectively.

armor.name: Saturn Straw Raincoat
armor.desc: Increases life and defense of the troops led by the hero
armor.long_desc: A gift from Saturn is legerity, durable and have greater defense.

boot.name: Saturn Shoes
boot.desc: Increases life of the troops led by the hero
boot.long_desc: A gift from Saturn, made of rare resources, increases life.

sword.name: Holy Pike
sword.desc: Increases attack and damage of the troops led by the hero
sword.long_desc: The Holy Pike is made of Ironwood and silversteel, and emits a soft, radiant glow.

helmet.name: Holy Helmet
helmet.desc: Increases life, defense and damage of the troops led by the hero
helmet.long_desc: Masterpiece of the Guild of Roman Blacksmith. This Holy Helmet is made of brass with the finest technique. The peacock feather on the top of the helmet indicates its elegance.

shield.name: Holy Shield
shield.desc: Increases the life and defense of the troops led by the hero
shield.long_desc: This massive shield is engraved with the symbol of Mars, and is unparalleled in craftsmanship and quality.

armor.name: Holy Armour
armor.desc: Increases life, damage and defense of the troops led by the hero
armor.long_desc: This silversteel armor was designed by the legendary blacksmith Catarin, whose daughter was slain by the Fearless Skullbearer.

boot.name: Holy Boots
boot.desc: Increases defense of the troops led by the hero
boot.long_desc: These boots were crafted using blessed Ironwood and the hide of a giant.

sword.name: Spartan Spear
sword.desc: Enhances the Offense of particular troop.

helmet.name: Spartan Helmet
helmet.desc: Enhances the Defense of particular troop.
helmet.long_desc: Forged in old Roman fashion with a modern touch.

shield.name: Spartan Shield
shield.desc: Enhances the HP of particular troop.

armor.name: Spartan Cape
armor.desc: Slightly enhances the Defense of particular troop.
armor.long_desc: Brand new cape:  gives you life long protection.

boot.name: Spartan Shinpads
boot.desc: Slightly enhances the HP of particular troop.

sword.name: Vulcan Sword
sword.long_desc: Sword made for honoring Vulcan, absorbing blessing from Vulcan.

helmet.name: Vulcan Helmet
helmet.long_desc: Helmet made for honoring Vulcan, absorbing blessing from Vulcan.

shield.name: Vulcan Shield
shield.long_desc: Shield made for honoring Vulcan, absorbing blessing from Vulcan.

armor.name: Vulcan Armor
armor.long_desc: Armor made for honoring Vulcan, absorbing blessing from Vulcan.

boot.name: Vulcan Boots
boot.long_desc: Boots made for honoring Vulcan, absorbing blessing from Vulcan.

sword.name: Hardcore Sword
sword.desc: Enhances the Damage to enemy of particular troop. You may get Black Ore from Carthage Revolt and Silver Ore from Carthage Revolt Main Force.
sword.long_desc: A sword forged by Vulcan, with high density, which is light and less likely to be rusting because it was forged with black ore and silver ore.

helmet.name: Hardcore Helmet
helmet.desc: Slightly enhances the Offense and Defense of particular troop.You may get Black Ore from Carthage Revolt and Silver Ore from Carthage Revolt Main Force.
helmet.long_desc: A helmet forged by Vulcan, owns excellent defense. Because it was forged with black ore and silver ore.

shield.name: Hardcore Shield
shield.desc: Slightly enhances the HP and Defense of particular troop.You may get Black Ore from Carthage Revolt and Silver Ore from Carthage Revolt Main Force.
shield.long_desc: A shield forged by Vulcan, can defend sharp piercing from the enemy. Because it was forged with black ore and silver ore.

armor.name: Hardcore Armor
armor.desc: Enhances the HP and Defense of particular troop.You may get Black Ore from Carthage Revolt and Silver Ore from Carthage Revolt Main Force.
armor.long_desc: Forged by Vulcan, owns excellent defense without affecting hero's flexibility because it was forged with black ore.

boot.name: Hardcore Boots
boot.desc: Enhances the Offense and the damage to enemy of particular troop. You may get Black Ore from Carthage Revolt and Silver Ore from Carthage Revolt Main Force.
boot.long_desc: A pair of boots made by Vulcan, owns excellent defense without affecting action of your hero because of the lightness of black ore and silver ore.

sword.name: Vertumnus Staff
sword.long_desc: Wand Vertumnus ever used. Present by Vertumnus lover Punama, the weapon is full of miss.

helmet.name: Vertumnus Garland
helmet.desc: Increases HP and Offense of the troop.
helmet.long_desc: Autumn wreath ever worn by Vertumnus. A pileum made with branch and petals, it can bring victory for whom wear.

shield.name: Vertumnus Shield
shield.desc: Increases HP and Defense of the troop.
shield.long_desc: Giant shield created by Vertumus. Made by huge tree body, 1.7 meters high and 0.8 meter wide.

armor.name: Vertumnus Robe
armor.desc: Increases HP and Defense of the troop.
armor.long_desc: Vertumnus' Summer robe. The Robe made with paper-thin silk and fantastic material.

boot.name: Vertumnus Shoes
boot.desc: Increases HP, Offense and Defense of the troop.
boot.long_desc: Sprind straw sandals made by Vertumnus. Sandal made with green grass and leaves, so comfortable.

sword.name: Javelin
sword.long_desc: The souvenirs is an imitation of the Olympic Games Javelin, presented to the outstanding heroes.

helmet.name: Olive Wreath
helmet.desc: Increases HP and Defense of the troop.
helmet.long_desc: The Olive wreath is the only prize granted to Olympic Games champion and is considered as the highest honor prize.

shield.name: Accoutre Race Shield
shield.desc: Increases HP and Defense of the troop.
shield.long_desc: The souvenirs is an imitation of the Olympic Games Accoutre Race Shield, presented to the outstanding heroes.

armor.name: Fur Coat
armor.desc: Increases HP and Defense of the troop.
armor.long_desc: In the past, the Olympic Games participants wear Fur Coat.

boot.name: Discus Throw
boot.long_desc: The souvenirs is an imitation of the Olympic Games Discus Throw, presented to the outstanding heroes.

armor.long_desc: God of war Mars grant "Son of Mars" excellent equipment, which will bring you high HP and  defensive power increase.
